about_project: An unofficial, open-source C language documentation for profit, designed to inspire people from multiple countries to learn one of the most important programming languages in history.
description_examples: A collection of C language examples, which you can use as a reference for developing in C or as a guide to learning about its many features. You can find more examples in the "Examples" section.
description_api_reference: C API Reference Documentation, Explore the APIs available in C in the "API Reference" section.

help.description_connect_community: Get help from the Open Lite community.
help.description_help_documentaton: If you find any errors in the reading or code examples, please help us correct and improve the documentation.
